achievementbadges-anon-text: Please log in to view achievements.
achievements-summary:
This feature is still in beta.
* You can use if [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-betafeatures|enable]] it.
* Achievements can be deleted without notice.
* Achievement(s) earned during the beta period can be initialized
This is a list of achievements.
achievementbadges-beta-feature-achieveme: Earn given achievements to get badges.
achievementbadges-pref-tooltip-achieveme: Notify me when I obtain an achievement.
log-description-achievementbadges: This is a log shows a list of achievements a user earned.
achievement-hint-enable-achievement-badg: Enable Achievement Badges on [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-betafeatures|the Beta features of Preferences]].
achievement-description-enable-achieveme: You enabled Achievement Badges! Please keep in mind the captions of beta.
achievement-description-sign-up: You are now a contributor of {{SITENAME}}!
achievement-description-edit-page-1: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 10 times! You are a hope of {{SITENAME}}.
achievement-description-edit-page-2: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 100 times! Your edit speed is getting faster.
achievement-hint-edit-page-3: Keep continue editing. It is a little hard to achieve this achievement.
achievement-description-edit-page-3: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 1000 times! Your hobby is {{SITENAME}} now.
achievement-hint-edit-page-4: Keep continue editing. This achievement is very difficult to achieve.
achievement-description-edit-page-4: You achieved editing {{SITENAME}} 10000 times! You are the editor-in-chief of {{SITENAME}} who no one to follow.
achievement-hint-edit-size-0: Write more than two or three sentences at a time when editing!
achievement-description-edit-size-0: More than 1,000 bytes of characters were inserted in the {{SITENAME}} page at a time. This makes this page richer!
achievement-hint-edit-size-1: When editing, try writing about one page of A4 at a time.
achievement-description-edit-size-1: More than 5,000 bytes of characters were inserted in the {{SITENAME}} page at a time. You have passed on the lump of knowledge to your wiki readers.
achievement-hint-edit-size-2: When editing, try writing more than two pages of A4 at a time.
achievement-description-edit-size-2: More than 10,000 bytes of characters were inserted in the {{SITENAME}} page at a time. Your knowledge will be widely used by many people.
achievement-hint-edit-size-3: When editing, try writing more than 10 pages of A4 at a time.
achievement-description-edit-size-3: More than 50,000 bytes of characters were inserted in the {{SITENAME}} page at a time. You have succeeded in making your debut at {{SITENAME}}.
achievement-hint-edit-size-4: Write very, very long text at once when editing! This achievement is very difficult to achieve.
achievement-description-edit-size-4: More than 100,000 bytes of characters were inserted in the {{SITENAME}} page at a time. You are a revered writer at {{SITENAME}}.
achievement-description-create-page-0: You have created one new page on {{SITENAME}}. Thank you.
achievement-hint-create-page-1: Continue to make new pages. This achievement is easy to achieve.
achievement-description-create-page-1: You have created five new pages on {{SITENAME}}.
achievement-hint-create-page-2: Continue to make new pages. This achievement is moderate difficulty.
achievement-description-create-page-2: You have created 30 new pages on {{SITENAME}}. {{SITENAME}} has your footstep.
achievement-hint-create-page-3: Continue to make new pages. This achievement is difficult to achieve.
achievement-description-create-page-3: You have created 100 new pages on {{SITENAME}}. Your traces are being colored on {{SITENAME}}!
achievement-hint-create-page-4: Continue to make new pages. This achievement is quite difficult to achieve.
achievement-description-create-page-4: You have created 300 new pages on {{SITENAME}}. {{SITENAME}} is full of trees you grew.
achievement-hint-create-page-5: Continue to make new pages. This is a very challenging achievement that takes a long time to achieve.
achievement-description-create-page-5: You have created 1000 new pages on {{SITENAME}}. You created your own forest in {{SITENAME}}.
achievement-description-long-user-page: You created your user page and introduced yourself!
